price: Pero sepan que solo se encaminará quien quiera Dios, Señor del universo.
arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa al-lahu rabbu al-ʿālamīna
